nodes.text: Kril'Dor was a planet located in the galaxy's Mid Rim that was a source of tibanna gas. Located close to the Uba system, Kril'Dor was positioned at the coordinates I-7 on the Standard Galactic Grid.

When investigating the theft of tibanna from the freighter Dromedar, Senior Lieutenant Thrawn of the Galactic Empire believed that the smuggler Nevil Cygni would have taken the stolen tibanna to Kril'Dor if he intended to sell it.

Kril'Dor was first mentioned in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. In the novel Thrawn, written by Timothy Zahn and released in 2017, it is capitalized as "Kril'dor".
In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Kril'Dor first appeared in Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy, a video game released in 2003.
